Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GoldCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoldCard extends Card implements Serializable
GoldCard, card with requirements that can generate points for the player

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard()
      Default constructor for an empty gold card

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int points, Resource resource, Corner[] frontCorners, Corner[] backCorners, int[] reqResources, Item reqItem, ReqPoint reqPoints, String id)
      Constructor of the class, initializes the gold cards with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      points - integer representing the points the card gives if the requirements are fulfilled
      resource - The type of resource of the card
      frontCorners - Corners of the front side of the card
      backCorners - Corners of the back side of the card
      reqResources - Array of int counting the number of each resource required to place the card (?)
      reqItem - Item required to place the card if reqPoints is equal to Item
      reqPoints - The type of requirement needed to obtain the points
      id - String representing the id of the card, used for images

  • Method Details

    • getSideID

      public String getSideID()
      Method that returns the ID of the current side of the card used to identify the corresponding image
      Returns:
      the string representing the current card and side ID

    • getSideID

      public String getSideID(boolean front)
      Overloading of the previous method, it returns the ID of a specific side of the card, used to identify the corresponding image
      Parameters:
      front - boolean representing the side, true = front, false = back
      Returns:
      the string representing the wanted carda and side ID

    • equals

      public boolean equals(GoldCard gol)
      Checks if two GoldCards have the same basic attributes
      Parameters:
      gol - GoldCard to compare
      Returns:
      true if the attributes are the same, false otherwise

    • countResource

      public int countResource(Resource res)
      Returns the number of a specific resource you need to have on the playground to place a card
      Parameters:
      res - The resource is desired to check
      Returns:
      The number of that resource needed on the playground

    • getPointsType

      public ReqPoint getPointsType()
      Returns the type of requirement needed to obtain points
      Returns:
      type of requirement (simple / corners / item)

    • getItem

      public Item getItem()
      Return the possible item needed by to obtain points
      Returns:
      The item needed or null if the reqPoints is not Item
